name: CabMonkey
description:
Tap Left To swing left: a, left arrow key, left shift or z

Tap Right to Swing right: d, right arrow key, right shift or x

Tap Both together to let go and then grab the next point

PROTIP!: If the timing seems hard, try going with the beat of the music!

Monkey's got to escape it's enclosure to catch a cab! (cab not featured in game). Banana's are lots of points, higher time = more points. 

High octane skill-based spin-platformed! While it is beatable, it is quite challenging (Think Getting Over It, QUOP). Prestige goes to those with the highscore! While I don't plan on working on this in the future, I would love to learn from my mistakes so let me know about any bugs you find please!

Thank you a ton for trying it out!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Music By Joshua Mclean https://opengameart.org/users/mrjoshuamclean

Everything Else by Wander
